data.name: UnoControlCurrencyFieldModel
desc: specifies the standard model of a UnoControlCurrencyField.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: BackgroundColor
desc: specifies the background color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: Border
desc: specifies the border style of the control.

properties.name: BorderColor
desc: specifies the color of the border, if present
Not every border style (see Border) may support coloring. For instance, usually a border with 3D effect will ignore the BorderColor setting.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: CurrencySymbol
desc: specifies the currency symbol.

properties.name: DecimalAccuracy
desc: specifies the decimal accuracy.

properties.name: Enabled
desc: determines whether the control is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: FontDescriptor
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontEmphasisMark
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis value of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontRelief
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontRelief value of the text in the control.

properties.name: HelpText
desc: specifies the help text of the control.

properties.name: HelpURL
desc: specifies the help URL of the control.

properties.name: HideInactiveSelection
desc: specifies whether the selection in the control should be hidden when the control is not active (focused).
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: HighlightColor
desc: specifies the background color (RGB) of selected text in the control which is highlighted.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.5

properties.name: HighlightTextColor
desc: specifies the text color (RGB) of selected text in the control which is highlighted.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.5

properties.name: MouseWheelBehavior
desc: defines how the mouse wheel can be used to scroll through the control's content.

Usually, the mouse wheel spins the numeric value displayed in the control. Using this property, and one of the MouseWheelBehavior constants, you can control under which circumstances this is possible.

properties.name: PrependCurrencySymbol
desc: specifies whether the currency symbol is to be prepended.

properties.name: Printable
desc: specifies that the control will be printed with the document.

properties.name: ReadOnly
desc: specifies that the content of the control cannot be modified by the user.

properties.name: Repeat
desc: specifies whether the mouse should show repeating behavior, i.e.
repeatedly trigger an action when keeping pressed.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: RepeatDelay
desc: specifies the mouse repeat delay, in milliseconds.

When the user presses a mouse in a control area where this triggers an action (such as spinning the value), then usual control implementations allow to repeatedly trigger this action, without the need to release the mouse button and to press it again. The delay between two such triggers is specified with this property.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: ShowThousandsSeparator
desc: specifies whether the thousands separator is to be displayed.

properties.name: Spin
desc: specifies that the control has a spin button.

properties.name: StrictFormat
desc: specifies that the value is checked during the user input.

properties.name: Tabstop
desc: specifies that the control can be reached with the TAB key.

properties.name: TextColor
desc: specifies the text color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: TextLineColor
desc: specifies the text line color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: Value
desc: specifies the value displayed in the control.

properties.name: ValueMax
desc: specifies the maximum value that can be entered.

properties.name: ValueMin
desc: specifies the minimum value that can be entered.

properties.name: ValueStep
desc: specifies the value step when using the spin button.

properties.name: VerticalAlign
desc: specifies the vertical alignment of the text in the control.
**since**
OOo 3.3

properties.name: WritingMode
desc: denotes the writing mode used in the control, as specified in the com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2 constants group.
Only com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2.LR_TB and com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2.RL_TB are supported at the moment.
**since**
OOo 3.1
